titlestmt.titleproper: Minutes of the Hunterian Society (New York, N.Y.)
titlestmt.author: Collection processed and described by Rebecca Pou

note.p: Preliminary processing and description done by Donald Prochera, 2007.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Rebecca Pou, November 19, 2008.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Minutes of the Hunterian Society (New York, N.Y.)

repository.corpname: New York Academy of Medicine Library. Coller Rare Book Reading Room.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Minutes of the Hunterian Society (New York, N.Y.). Coller Rare Book Reading Room, New York Academy of Medicine Library.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Hunterian Society of New York held regular meetings in the homes and offices of members and occasionally at local clubhouses. Meetings featured presentation of cases, patients, and papers by Society members, as well as organizational business. The Society had no known relationship with the Hunterian Society established in the United Kingdom.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Includes minutes, meeting announcements, and attendance sheets (1919-1920).

arrangement.head: Arrangement of Collection
arrangement.p: A single series of minutes, compiled chronologically.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the catalog of The New York Academy of Medicine Library. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.

controlaccess.subject: Medicine -- New York (State) -- New York -- Societies, etc.

userestrict.p: Requests for permission to quote from or publish any materials should be directed to the curatorial staff of the Coller Rare Book Reading Room in writing.
